$interpreted: Sione: Your Highness, are you alright?
Angelia: I'm... I'm alright... Have my uncle and the others caught up yet?
Dylan: Don't think so. Most likely held up by the monsters.
Dylan: If we make it to Sunshine Ridge, we should be safe for a while.
Angelia: What will... become of us?
Dylan: Theodore has won the nobles' popularity vote. With him in power, surely he will conjure other methods to invade surrounding nations.
Angelia: Am I...the only one who can stop him?
Dylan: Theodore may have slandered the Princess with deceit, but we all know that Your Highness is the true leader of our Kingdom of the Sun.
Sione: A minority of nobles are dissatisfied with Theodore. If we can get their support, along with that of the Sunshine Infantry,

Sione: 
we still have a chance to overthrow him.
Angelia: Wouldn't that... completely tear our nation apart?
Naya: Do not fear for the future! Let's have a cup of tea. We'll think about this later!
Angelia: Good point. Back to Sunshine Ridge it is.
Naya: ...Nigel...
Nigel: Where... where are we?
Yamitsuki: Atlas...... home.
Nigel: I'm still alive?
Nigel: Where are those nasty nobles? Are they dead yet?
Yamitsuki: Not so. They were whisked away by Theodore.
Nigel: Has my plan... failed? But why?
Yamitsuki: ...It was I ...who let Aosta stop you.
Nigel: WHY?! Do you know how much heart and soul I've poured into this?
Nigel: When I learned the castle would fly for Atlas a year ago, I already—
Yamitsuki: —Because Hyacinthus told me everything...
Yamitsuki: Hyacinthus learned you wished to perish together with those nobles.
Yamitsuki: She couldn't bear to see you die, yet knew deep down that nothing would persuade you. She left me a message in my dreams.
Nigel: Hyacinthus...knew of my intentions?
Yamitsuki: Your operation happens to benefit Aosta's. Everything Hyacinthus told me, I passed on.
Yamitsuki: At the cost of saving your life...

Nigel: Hyacinthus... even if I were the last person in this
world, you would do anything to keep me safe...
Nigel: But what should I... do now? I have nothing to live for...
Yamitsuki: The Dragoneye Gem has returned to its place. Monsters shall roam no longer.
Nigel: WHAT?!
Yamitsuki: If we can get rid of the lingering monsters, this home bittersweet home of ours, maybe...
Nigel: ...Take me outside, I want to see with my own eyes.
Uzziah: Amazing to see how far you're willing to go, just so that the void will not swallow your library whole.
Uzziah: Much respect for your plight.
Aosta: Quit your yammering. The Character Mineral you gave me 27 years ago can revive Morris, my mentor...
Charle: Aosta!
Aosta: Hmph. So you've made it...
Charle: A stranger with a black aura... Aosta, what are you—
Aosta: —None of your concern. Our partnership has come to an end.
Aosta: The experiment... can finally continue. Professor, wait for me.

Model.Text: Your Highness, are you alright?
I'm... I'm alright... Have my uncle and the others caught up yet?
Don't think so. Most likely held up by the monsters.
If we make it to Sunshine Ridge, we should be safe for a while.
What will... become of us?
Theodore has won the nobles' popularity vote. With him in power, surely he will conjure other methods to invade surrounding nations.
Am I...the only one who can stop him?
Theodore may have slandered the Princess with deceit, but we all know that Your Highness is the true leader of our Kingdom of the Sun.
A minority of nobles are dissatisfied with Theodore. If we can get their support, along with that of the Sunshine Infantry,
we still have a chance to overthrow him.

Do not fear for the future! Let's have a cup of tea. We'll think about this later!
Good point. Back to Sunshine Ridge it is.
...Nigel...

If we can get rid of the lingering monsters, this home bittersweet home of ours, maybe...
...Take me outside, I want to see with my own eyes.
Amazing to see how far you're willing to go, just so that the void will not swallow your library whole.
Much respect for your plight.
Quit your yammering. The Character Mineral you gave me 27 years ago can revive Morris, my mentor...
Aosta!
Hmph. So you've made it...
A stranger with a black aura... Aosta, what are you—
—None of your concern. Our partnership has come to an end.
The experiment... can finally continue. Professor, wait for me.
